info.name: Subphonic
info.description: Subphonic lets you play music from subsonic in owncloud and also to use headphones. Tanks to : tsquillario for MiniSub (https://github.com/tsquillario/MiniSub), rembo10 for Headphones (https://github.com/rembo10/headphones) and Sindre for Subsonic (http://www.subsonic.org)
info.author: Create by Zoic21
